title.en: Prayer to Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo and Jamyang Khyentse Chökyi Lodrö1

text.en: Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo, who received the Seven Authoritative Transmissions,
Regent of Padmasambhava, Pema Do-ngak Lingpa,
text.en-trans: pemé gyaltsab pema do ngak ling

text.en: Ösal Trulpé Dorje, at your lotus feet,
I offer heartfelt prayers: inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: nying né solwa deb so jingyi lob

text.en: Lodrö Gyatso, great charioteer of sūtra and mantra,
I offer heartfelt prayers: inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: You who spread Padma’s profound, secret teachings in the ten directions,
Sun of Vajra Wisdom, Yeshe Dorje,
Transfer the blessings of your wisdom realization
And inspire me to accomplish my aspirations in accordance with the Dharma.
text.en-trans: samdön chö zhin drubpar jingyi lob
